metadata.synopsis: One-liner for onlooker1 from the Eastway Doom Sayer Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the onlooker from the Eastway Doomsayer vignette, on the plaza between the Elfsong tavern and Baldur's Mouth.

0.speaker: Flant Borlley
0.text: Lord Gortash will protect us all - even if you can't appreciate his genius.

1.speaker: Flant Borlley
1.text: If you do speak to Lord Gortash, please give him my regards. My name's Ashwyn. Thank you!
1.context: NodeContext: Seeing what he thinks is an opportunity to be known by Gortash

2.speaker: Flant Borlley
2.text: With your reputation, I bet you've met already Lord Gortash. He must be so potent up close...
2.context: NodeContext: Impressed by the player but also definitely has a crush on Gortash

3.speaker: Flant Borlley
3.text: I've heard about you. We don't need someone putting Baldur's Gate in any more danger with their idiocy.

4.speaker: Flant Borlley
4.text: Lord Gortash is such an impressive figure of a man - I can see why he's in charge...

5.speaker: Flant Borlley
5.text: Lord Gortash is exactly what Baldur's Gate needs - I dread to think where we'd be without the Steel Watch.
